comments.body: The 2nd fName and the 2nd fTitle seems misaligned in the rendering I get (from click "view file"),
It is a misleading display here in GitHub view. It looks ok in the generated documentation.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +60,64 @@       1->.. Name      = lName bytes with the name of the object <directory name>    TNamed::fName
       0->0  lTitle    = Number of bytes in the object title                         TNamed::fTitle
       1->.. Title     = lTitle bytes with the title of the object <directory title> TNamed::fTitle
 --------DATA----------------
       0->0  Modified  = True if directory has been modified                         TDirectory::fModified
